Text:
I am still trying to get this to work.
My first try, sorry I don't quite know how to seed stuff.
I'm gonna keep trying, feel free to download and help me out.

Seems to be working now!
Enjoy the movie.
Någon speciell codec man måste ha ? kan inte spela upp filmen, har installerat senaste DivX.

Eftersom jag inte laddat ned filmen så kan jag tyvärr inte svara på vilket CODEC som behövs. Du kan ta reda på det själv på ett enkelt sätt: Ladda ned gratisprogrammet G-spot från http://www.headbands.com/gspot/
Med hjälp av detta kan du kontrollera vilka video- och audio-CODECs som behövs för en specifik videofil. Du öppnar videofilen i G-spot, som sedan analyserar den och berättar vilka CODEC som behövs. Hoppas att detta hjälper.

mvh/T

Sorry, I only understand English.
This movie is uncensored.
This is rare, because most Japanese movies are censored.

No problem, Mr Sparkle - I just tried to help out regarding a CODEC-issue and since he asked in swedish I answered in swedish too.

Thx for the upload - nothing I needed/wanted, but still :)
I agree - the vast majority of JAP is censored.
For more JAP, also try http://www.javfans.us/

cheers/T

according to GSpot, its an OGM encoded movie, which means the video stream is XVID, and the audio stream is OGG.

get the video/audio splitter from here: http://www.inmatrix.com/zplayer/formats/ogm.shtml

get the audio codec from here: http://www.inmatrix.com/zplayer/formats/vorbis.shtml

DIVX plays XVID too, get DIVX here: http://www.divx.com/divx/windows/

happy wanking .. ;-P
You can play this using VLC.
